Texts.Chs: 或许你可以考虑升级你的^orange;加工台^reset;，并从中制作一个^orange;基因提取器^reset;，因为它的效率比植物分析台更^green;快^reset;！你可以把每一种植物种子都丢进去，观察它们发生的变化。快行动起来把！
Texts.Eng: Constructing a ^orange;Xeno Station^reset; upon upgrading your Machining Table is a good idea, as they are ^green;much faster^reset;! Effectively every plant seed can be placed within seed labs, and each one will produce different results. Start with basic plants, and work up from there.

Texts.Chs: 你制作了一个^orange;植物分析台^reset;而不知道怎么使用它？其实很简单：把一个^orange;土豆种子^reset;放进去，等待大约60秒，你就会得到一个^orange;有用的基因^reset;啦！
Texts.Eng: So you've built a ^orange;Sprouting Table^reset;? Why are you looking so clueless? It's simple: Toss in ^orange;a potato seed^reset; and wait about 60 seconds. You'll get a useful ^orange;gene type^reset; for your botany research, or other goods
